title: Still honor 0
body: Hey riot i god a 14 day ban back in season 7 and now its season 0 and i got a message saying ive been better and i unlocked honor but its been a bout 1 month to 1 1/2 months of constant playing, i get honored in most games but im still honor 0. just wondering if this is normal or if this is a bug thank you :D

replies.body: we will be reset to honor level 2 in jan.....so don't worry about it.  Though i do hate Riot's triple punishment system.

> we will be reset to honor level 2 in jan.....so don't worry about it.

This is not correct. Stay tuned for the full information soonish.

It's no smite, but Fuck it; it's Monday.

The 'fresh start' or 'clean slate' was for the launch of the honor system only. Honor will 'reset', but that does not mean players with 'dishonor' ratings will be moved up.

https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/HIZAeknK-honor-season-2018-on-pbe

Ya i remember them saying that it'd be reset. It must be different for sub honor 2 folks. Or who knows. 

Seems odd to stop getting honor capsules due to the reset.

D= Tantram you can't do this to us!!! You're such a tease!

>
> This is not correct. Stay tuned for the full information soonish.

Oh, so the info on the official youtube channel is wrong (referring to the honer explained video)?

Also, if it doesn't reset.....isn't that (in a way) triple punishing a player?  Original punishment, honor lock, then honor level 0?
The video you linked is for the switch from the old system to the new system, not between seasons... and Tantram confirmed you are mistaken.

From what I've seen of people posting on here, lots of players tend to get so frustrated with the continuous punishments that they end up being toxic again before they finally get reset... really sad to watch, and not at all helpful for the community. A single level of incremental punishment would be good enough imo...

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

to be honest i was never toxic in the first place i was just having a bad day and i wanted to play league to let off some steam but the enemy team kept flamming me for sucking so i got annoyed and cussed them out.. i got banned for that but its fine, it was my fault for no just mutting them. i definally learned my lesson but i just want to be able to get rewards again! {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

This could easily be remedied if it was something like....10 game restrict = honor level 1   25= honor level 0   2 week =  honor level 0 + a lock  ....just as you said.
